content.value:
is sysvinit better, or is systemd better?

become enlightened. the right answer is that neither is good, because they make the computer turn on.

the best init system is no init system. Let the computer stay off.
content.html: is sysvinit better, or is systemd better? become enlightened. the right answer is that neither is good, because they make the computer turn on. the best init system is no init system. Let the computer stay off.
